help-file.title: SKILL_CLERIC
help-file.content:
The following is a list of all skills and spells available to the Cleric class:
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 1st level: 1h bludgeon, 2h bludgeon, age corpse, bandage, carve, clerical spell knowledge, climb, dodge, first aid, meditate, mine, mount, quick chant, retreat, swim
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 1st circle: Armor, Bless, Cause Light, Cure Light, Detect Evil, Detect Good, Detect Magic, Turn Undead 2nd circle: Blindness, Cause Serious, Cure Serious, Preserve, Protection from Cold, Protection from Fire, Slow Poison, Vigorize Light, Word of Command 3rd circle: Cause Critical, Cure Blind, Cure Critic, Dispel Evil, Dispel Good, Earthquake, Remove Poison, Sense Life, Vigorize Serious, 4th circle: Cure Disease, Protection from Acid, Protection from Evil, Protection from Gas, Protection from Good, Protection from Lightning, Remove Curse, Summon, Vigorize Critic 5th circle: Destroy Undead, Heal, Soulshield, Vitality 6th circle: Continual Light, Curse, Darkness, Fear, Flame Strike, Harm 7th circle: Full Heal, Lesser Resurrect, Water Breathing 8th circle: Dispel Magic, Mass Heal 9th circle: Holy Word, Plane Shift, Silence, Unholy Word, Word of Recall, 10th circle: Accelerated Healing, Full Harm, Resurrect 11th circle: Group Recall, Mass Preserve, True Seeing 12th circle: Miracle
Cleric Specializations --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Healer, Holyman, Zealot
